医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
MIP Discovery 更名为 Tozaro，完成支持细胞和基因治疗病毒载体分析和纯化的转型Tozaro 合理设计的智能聚合物亲和试剂提供新颖的分析和纯化解决方案，以增强细胞和基因治疗中病毒载体的开发和制造。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240806/MIP-Discovery-rebrands-as-Tozaro-as-it-completes-transition-to-supporting-cell-and-gene-therapy-viral-vector-分析和纯化.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240806/MIP-Discovery-rebrands-as-Tozaro-as-it-completes-transition-to-supporting-cell-and-gene-therapy-viral-vector-分析和纯化.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=1916fef7-ef4e-4837-a578-657732f4c7a0 Tue, 06 Aug 2024 06:04:00 -0400 MIP Discovery rebrands as Tozaro as it completes transition to supporting cell and gene therapy viral vector analytics and purification
“我的手机有时让我焦虑”：研究调查了智能手机使用问题与焦虑、睡眠和抑郁之间的关联研究人员确定了英国青少年中智能手机使用问题 (PSU) 与焦虑、抑郁和失眠之间的关系。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240806/My-phone-sometimes-makes-me-anxious-Study-investigates-associations- Between-problematic-smartphone-usage-and-anxiety-sleep-and-抑郁症.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240806/My-phone-sometimes-makes-me-anxious-Study-investigates-associations- Between-problematic-smartphone-usage-and-anxiety-sleep-and-抑郁症.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=d70793af-f9c1-4a3c-a871-7690e2807771 Tue, 06 Aug 2024 05:34:00 -0400 'My phone sometimes makes me anxious': Study investigates associations between problematic smartphone usage and anxiety, sleep, and depression
研究发现，COVID-19 患者在感染后两到三年内仍存在长期认知和精神问题最近的一项研究调查了精神和认知症状是否在与 COVID-19 相关的住院治疗一年后开始或持续存在。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240806/Study-finds-long-term-cognitive-and-psychiatric-issues-persist-in-COVID-19-患者-两到三年-感染后.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240806/Study-finds-long-term-cognitive-and-psychiatric-issues-persist-in-COVID-19-患者-两到三年-感染后.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=7ebff002-2a93-4de7-bcb0-b530aaf5092f Tue, 06 Aug 2024 05:07:00 -0400 Study finds long-term cognitive and psychiatric issues persist in COVID-19 patients two to three years post-infection
减少叶酸摄入量可增强老年小鼠的代谢可塑性许多国家长期以来一直在主食中强化叶酸。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240806/Reduced-folate-intake-enhances-metabolic- Plasticity-in-ged-mice.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240806/Reduced-folate-intake-enhances-metabolic- Plasticity-in-ged-mice.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=91c7deb8-e34c-4be9-bd94-e5b640e904c2 Tue, 06 Aug 2024 04:35:00 -0400 Reduced folate intake enhances metabolic plasticity in aged mice
植物性饮食被证明可以对抗高血压医生建议将水果和蔬菜作为高血压患者治疗的基础部分。研究发现，富含水果和蔬菜的饮食可以降低血压，降低心血管风险，并由于其产碱作用而改善肾脏健康。爱思唯尔在《美国医学杂志》上发表的一项新研究详细介绍了一项为期五年的介入随机对照试验的结果。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240806/Plant-based-diet-proven-to-combat-hypertension.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240806/Plant-based-diet-proven-to-combat-hypertension.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=83715d21-e7b5-47af-a419-f897c6e4f6a3 Tue, 06 Aug 2024 01:18:00 -0400 Plant-based diet proven to combat hypertension
解决前列腺癌患者的心理健康危机南澳大利亚大学的研究人员表示，心理健康筛查必须纳入前列腺癌的常规诊断中。这项呼吁是在新的研究表明男性在前列腺癌诊断期间和诊断后立即需要更多支持之后发出的。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240806/Addressing-the-mental-health-crisis-among-prostate-cancer-病人.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240806/Addressing-the-mental-health-crisis-among-prostate-cancer-病人.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=0b0d12b6-dc7e-4d1a-a8f1-8a6f1db7dbe4 Tue, 06 Aug 2024 00:52:53 -0400 Addressing the mental health crisis among prostate cancer patients
泌尿科医生权衡男性避免去看医生的原因数据一致表明，尽管在大多数死因中，男性通常比女性面临更高的死亡率和更短的预期寿命，但他们不愿意寻求医疗护理。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240806/Urogue-weighs-in-on-why-men-avoid-doctor-visits.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240806/Urograph-weighs-in-on-why-men-avoid-doctor-visits.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=077a60b8-f3b7-4c39-9261-07124c5bee96 Tue, 06 Aug 2024 00:51:57 -0400 Urologist weighs in on why men avoid doctor visits
更年期神话：区分事实与虚构许多女性在进入更年期时都对未来感到焦虑。您可能听过您的祖母、母亲或阿姨们对更年期（又名“变化”）感叹，这是一个充满潮热、体重增加和性欲直线下降的压力时期。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240806/Menopause-myths-Separating-fact-from-fiction.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240806/Menopause-myths-Separating-fact-from-fiction.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=b60f4c55-d158-418b-8496-f2bd6e88d2ae Tue, 06 Aug 2024 00:50:13 -0400 Menopause myths: Separating fact from fiction
丙戊酸有望降低 COVID-19 的严重程度和住院率研究人员发现，丙戊酸 (VPA)，尤其是与 DHA 结合使用时，可显着降低 SARS-CoV-2 感染率和严重程度，可能会激活抗病毒机制。流行病学数据支持 VPA 在降低 COVID-19 严重程度和住院率方面的作用。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240806/Valproic-acid-shows-promise-in-reducing-COVID-19-severity-and-hospitalization.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240806/Valproic-acid-shows-promise-in-reducing-COVID-19-severity-and-hospitalization.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=693b3530-6556-4c6a-ba50-155e5cf56df2 Tue, 06 Aug 2024 00:39:00 -0400 Valproic acid shows promise in reducing COVID-19 severity and hospitalization
社会因素在决定寿命方面起着至关重要的作用性别、婚姻状况、教育和种族四重因素的相互作用与美国公民 18 年的寿命差距有关，虽然没有一个因素比其他因素的影响更大，但一个人拥有的这些影响因素越多，发表在开放获取期刊 BMJ Open 上的研究发现，过早死亡的风险越高。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240806/Social-factors-play-crucial-role-in-determining-lifespan.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240806/Social-factors-play-crucial-role-in-determining-lifespan.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=c63a5e56-ecea-4c8b-bda1-6a1c767f9fe2 Tue, 06 Aug 2024 00:37:00 -0400 Social factors play crucial role in determining lifespan
